story: Just a curious human who turned ‘what if I code this?’ into a daily habit. Now I build web apps that usually work — and when they don’t, I fix them faster than you can say ‘bug report’.

timeline.event: Began B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering at L.J. Institute of Engineering and Technology
Participated in hackathons and explored new technologies
Started exploring full-stack development and building small personal projects
Started journey in the corporate world through internships
